00044 typedef signed char Char;           /* Signed 8 bits. */
00045 typedef unsigned char Uchar;  /* Unsigned 8 bits. */
00046 typedef short Short;                /* Signed 16 bits please. */
00047 typedef unsigned short Ushort;      /* Unsigned 16 bits please. */
00048 typedef long Long;                        /* Signed 32 bits. */
00049 typedef unsigned long Ulong;  /* Unsigned 32 bits. */

00052 typedef int ErrCode;                /* ErrXXX or Success. */

00068       Pixel pixels[2];

00070 
00071       /* Flic Header */
00072 typedef struct
00073 {
00074       Long        size;             /* Size of flic including this header. */
00075       Ushort      type;             /* Either FLI_TYPE or FLC_TYPE below. */
00076       Ushort      frames;           /* Number of frames in flic. */
00077       Ushort      width;            /* Flic width in pixels. */
00078       Ushort      height;           /* Flic height in pixels. */
00079       Ushort      depth;            /* Bits per pixel.  (Always 8 now.) */
00080       Ushort      flags;            /* FLI_FINISHED | FLI_LOOPED ideally. */
00081       Long        speed;            /* Delay between frames. */
00082       Short       reserved1;  /* Set to zero. */
00083       Short       created1;
00084       Short       created2;
00085       //Ulong           created;          /* Date of flic creation. (FLC only.) */
00086       Short       creator1;
00087       Short       creator2;
00088       //Ulong           creator;          /* Serial # of flic creator. (FLC only.) */
00089       Short       updated1;
00090       Short       updated2;
00091       //Ulong           updated;          /* Date of flic update. (FLC only.) */
00092       Short       updater1;
00093       Short       updater2;
00094       //Ulong           updater;          /* Serial # of flic updater. (FLC only.) */
00095       Ushort      aspect_dx;  /* Width of square rectangle. (FLC only.) */
00096       Ushort      aspect_dy;  /* Height of square rectangle. (FLC only.) */
00097       Char        reserved2[38];    /* Set to zero. */
00098       Long        oframe1;                /* Offset to frame 1. (FLC only.) */
00099       Long        oframe2;                /* Offset to frame 2. (FLC only.) */
00100       Char        reserved3[40];    /* Set to zero. */
00101 } FlicHead;
00102 
00103 typedef struct
00104 {
00105       Pixel *pixels;    /* Set to AOOO:0000 for hardware. */
00106       int width, height;      /* Dimensions of screen. (320x200) */
00107         char change_palette;  /*True means that the flic changes the palette */
00108 } FlicScreen;                             /* Device specific screen type. */
00109

00111 {
00112   Ulong max_loop_count,
00113       loop_count;
00114   Ushort max_frame_index,
00115          frame_index;
00116 } FlicFrameStatus;

00125 typedef struct _Flic
00126 {
00127   FlicHead head;  /* Flic file header. */
00128   FILE *file;           /* File handle. */
00129   const char *name;           /* Name from flic_open.  Helps error reporting. */
00130   int xoff,yoff;  /* Offset to display flic at. */
00131 
00132   FlicFrameStatus status;
00133   FlicScreen screen;
00134   FlicLib lib;
00135 
00136   FlicOpenFunc *open;
00137   FlicCheckFrameFunc *check_frame;
00138   FlicSeekFunc       *seek;
00139 
00140 } Flic;
00141 
00142       /* Values for FlicHead.type */
00143 #define FLI_TYPE 0xAF11u      /* 320x200 .FLI type ID */
00144 #define FLC_TYPE 0xAF12u      /* Variable rez .FLC type ID */
00145       /* Values for FlicHead.flags */
00146 #define FLI_FINISHED 0x0001
00147 #define FLI_LOOPED       0x0002
00148 
00149       /* Optional Prefix Header */
00150 typedef struct
00151 {
00152       Long size;        /* Size of prefix including header. */
00153       Ushort type;      /* Always PREFIX_TYPE. */
00154       Short chunks;     /* Number of subchunks in prefix. */
00155       Char reserved[8];/* Always 0. */
00156 } PrefixHead;
00157 
00158 /* Value for PrefixHead.type */
00159 #define PREFIX_TYPE  0xF100u
00160 
00161 /* Frame Header */
00162 typedef struct
00163 {
00164       Long size;        /* Size of frame including header. */
00165       Ushort type;      /* Always FRAME_TYPE */
00166       Short chunks;     /* Number of chunks in frame. */
00167       Char reserved[8];/* Always 0. */
00168 } FrameHead;
00169 
00170 /* Value for FrameHead.type */
00171 #define FRAME_TYPE 0xF1FAu
00172 
00173       /* Chunk Header */
00174 typedef struct
00175 {
00176       Long size;        /* Size of chunk including header. */
00177       Ushort type;      /* Value from ChunkTypes below. */
00178 } ChunkHead;
00179 
00180 typedef enum
00181 {
00182       COLOR_256 = 4,    /* 256 level color pallette info. (FLC only.) */
00183       DELTA_FLC = 7,    /* Word-oriented delta compression. (FLC only.) */
00184       COLOR_64 = 11,    /* 64 level color pallette info. */
00185       DELTA_FLI = 12,   /* Byte-oriented delta compression. */
00186       BLACK_FRAME = 13,       /* whole frame is color 0 */
00187       BYTE_RUN = 15,    /* Byte run-length compression. */
00188       LITERAL = 16,     /* Uncompressed pixels. */
00189       PSTAMP = 18,      /* "Postage stamp" chunk. (FLC only.) */
00190 } ChunkTypes;
